## PolicySourceEmbeddedPDP interface

Policies sourced from an [embedded policy decision point](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos-hub/legacy/decision-points-embedded)<!-- -->.

```typescript
export interface PolicySourceEmbeddedPDP 
```
